Question: This person won the election on November 7, 2000, with 55 percent of the vote to Lazio's 43 percent.
Hints: This person opposed the Iraq War troop surge of 2007.
She received a Juris Doctor degree from Yale in 1973, having stayed on an extra year to be with this person.
In November 2004, this person announced that she would seek a second Senate term.
